text: Bride of the Devil is the seventeenth album by Detroit rock band Electric Six and the fourteenth in their official canon. ==Track listing== All songs written by Electric Six. # "The Opener" – 3:01 # "Daddy's Boy" – 3:04 # "(It Gets) (A Little) Jumpy" – 2:35 # "Safety Girl" – 3:02 # "You're Toast" – 3:21 # "Hades Ladies" – 3:14 # "Bride of the Devil" – 3:08 # "Witches Burning" – 3:01 # "Full Moon over the Internet" – 3:20 # "Grey Areas" – 3:06 # "The Worm in the Wood" – 3:14 ==Personnel== Electric Six * Dick Valentine - vocals * - lead guitar * Da Vé - rhythm guitar * Rob Lower - bass * Tait Nucleus? - keyboards Additional personnel * Tude Glase - drums * Holspolo * Herb S. Flavorings ==References== Category:2018 albums Category:Electric Six albums Category:Metropolis Records albums
title: Bride of the Devil
